MainPage.title: Resources

MainPage.welcomeText: No strict rules or boring instructions here. This is a place for learning, fun, and small victories in the world of cloud technologies. ‚òÅ

MainPage.funContent: Some fun content to make learning not only useful but also enjoyable üòé
MainPage.usefulLinks: Useful links to various interesting resources, answers to frequently asked questions, and much more.
MainPage.fanInitiative: This is a small fan initiative for everyone who wants to learn stress-free and enjoy the process.
MainPage.joinAndLearn: Join in, learn, and have fun! üöÄ

AboutPage.title: About this fan site
AboutPage.intro: This site was created to help you explore GCP, AI, and related technologies in a fun and relaxed way.
AboutPage.funProject: A fan project to make learning enjoyable and engaging.
AboutPage.resources: A curated selection of resources, guides, and tools for anyone.
AboutPage.community: A place to find answers to common questions and tips.
AboutPage.note: This is an unofficial site, just to make learning light and fun üòâ

FAQ.Title: Expanded Questions
FAQ.Description: This page is inspired by an article on Medium. It contains questions from the original article as well as new questions and answers that may be helpful for your learning and practice. Whether you are just starting or seeking to deepen your knowledge, this resource will guide you in asking the right questions and finding useful answers.

RolePage.instruction: üëâ Click on a dot or name to learn more about the GCP role

TrendingPage.title: Google Trends ‚Äî Ukraine
TrendingPage.intro: Google Trends shows what Google users are searching for in real time and allows you to track popular queries by country, region, or category. You can analyze interest trends over time, compare multiple queries, and follow trends in news and social media.
TrendingPage.helpText: This service helps marketers, journalists, researchers, and ordinary users better understand current events and popular topics. For detailed viewing and in-depth analysis, visit {link}.
TrendingPage.fallbackDescription: Unable to load trends. Please try again later.
TrendingPage.fallbackExtendedDescription: The Google Trends service is temporarily unavailable. Usually, you can view the most popular search queries of Ukrainian users in real time, analyze interest dynamics, and find related news.

QuizIntro.title: GCP Career Matchmaker: Find Your Ideal Role!
QuizIntro.intro: Have you ever wondered which role in the Google Cloud Platform world suits you best?
QuizIntro.about-1: This quiz is based on the
QuizIntro.about-2: model, which helps identify your professional interests. Take the quiz to find your ideal role!

R.title: Realistic
R.description: Hands-on work with infrastructure, server setup, and process automation in the cloud.

I.title: Investigative
I.description: Data analysis, working with BigQuery, machine learning, and optimizing GCP services.

A.title: Artistic
A.description: Creative development of applications, architecture design, and UI/UX solutions.

S.title: Social
S.description: Collaborating with teams, user support, implementing solutions, and conducting GCP training.

E.title: Enterprising
E.description: Leadership in projects, managing teams, and strategic planning on GCP.

C.title: Conventional
C.description: Documenting processes, monitoring services, and maintaining cloud standards and procedures.

QuizResult.copyLink: Copy the link and share it with friends!

CloudDigitalLeader.description: You lead digital transformation, manage teams, and implement innovations.

GenerativeAILeader.description: You manage AI and generative model projects.

GoogleWorkspaceAdministrator.description: You manage Google Workspace services for a team or organization.

CloudDeveloper.description: You develop diverse applications, write code, and build functional solutions.

StartupCloudEngineer.description: You quickly implement cloud solutions for startups and innovations.

DataAnalyst.description: You analyze data, create reports, and help the business make decisions.

DevOpsEngineer.description: You automate development and delivery processes, integrate CI/CD.

APIDeveloper.description: You specialize in integrations and APIs, solving complex technical tasks.

ContactCenterEngineer.description: You ensure stable operation of contact centers and communication systems.

SecurityEngineer.description: You protect systems, find vulnerabilities, and implement security measures.

NetworkEngineer.description: You configure networks, ensure security and connection stability.

DatabaseEngineer.description: You manage databases, optimize performance and reliability.

CloudArchitect.description: You design cloud architectures, optimize systems, and manage scaling.

HybridMultiCloudArchitect.description: You design hybrid and multi-cloud solutions for complex systems.

MachineLearningEngineer.description: You build ML models and integrate them into products.

CloudEngineer.description: You are a practical cloud systems engineer, setting up and maintaining infrastructure.

CitizenDeveloper.description: You create no-code solutions and help automate business processes.

DataEngineer.description: You build data pipelines and ensure data quality for analytics and ML.

About.title: About the Project üåå
About.intro: This is an unofficial fan project created to help you better understand GCP, AI, and related technologies in an accessible and relaxed way. The visual design in the style of a starry and cloudy sky symbolizes cloud services that "float" in the digital space, opening new opportunities for learning and experiments. That‚Äôs where the playful name SkyNet comes from.
About.responsibility: Today, many discoveries happen thanks to AI. At the same time, it‚Äôs important to remember responsible use of technology, because without proper control it may have unpredictable consequences. üòé
About.friendly: Our SkyNet is exclusively friendly and educational. It helps you dive into the world of GCP, AI, and cloud services, creating a space for experiments and easy learning. And let the scenes from ‚ÄúTerminator‚Äù stay only in the movies ‚Äî because smart and safe use of AI brings nothing but benefits.

GoogleBlogWidget.uaBlog: There is also the official Google Ukraine blog, where you can be the first to get updates! Click here

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: This fan site {site} respects your privacy. We strive to provide safe and comfortable use of the site without collecting unnecessary information about you.

section1.title: 1. What data we collect
section1.point1: We do not collect personal data from users.
section1.point2: Visiting the site is possible without registration or entering personal data.

section2.title: 2. Use of cookies
section2.text: The site may use technical cookies for proper functioning (for example, saving language preferences or theme settings). These cookies do not contain personal data. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

section3.title: 3. Third-party services
section3.text: The site may include embedded third-party services (YouTube, social buttons, analytics). They may collect anonymous data under their own policies. We do not control this processing and recommend reviewing the privacy policies of the respective services.

section4.title: 4. Use of data
section4.text: All information that may be collected automatically (e.g., visit statistics) is used only to improve the site and is not shared with third parties.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.text: We take measures to protect the site from unauthorized access or misuse of information. However, complete security of data transmission over the Internet cannot be guaranteed.

section6.title: 6. Changes to the policy
section6.text: This policy may be updated. We recommend reviewing it periodically before new visits to the site.

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.intro: This fan site {site} is created exclusively for educational and entertainment purposes. All materials on the site are unofficial and are not affiliated with commercial companies or rights holders.

sec1.title: 1. Non-commercial nature
sec1.p1: The site has no commercial purpose.
sec1.p2: All materials are posted for informational and personal use only.
sec1.p3: Use of brands, logos or names is carried out under the principles of fair use.

sec2.title: 2. Responsible use
sec2.text: Users agree to use the site only for lawful purposes. It is forbidden to use information obtained for unlawful actions, infringement of third-party rights or distribution of harmful content.

sec3.title: 3. Disclaimer
sec3.text: The site administration is not responsible for any consequences of using the site's materials. All information is provided "as is" without any warranties of accuracy, completeness or fitness for a particular purpose.

sec4.title: 4. External links
sec4.text: The site may contain links to external resources. We do not control the content or policies of those resources and are not responsible for them.

sec5.title: 5. Changes to the terms
sec5.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms of use at any time without prior notice. We recommend periodically reviewing this section to stay informed of updates.

Terms.confirmation: By using the site, you confirm that you have read these terms and agree to comply with them.

GoogleTrends.title: Google Trends ‚Äî Ukraine
GoogleTrends.description_short: These are the latest trends of Google users in Ukraine in real time.
GoogleTrends.description_long: Google Trends allows you to see the most popular search queries of Ukrainian users in real time, analyze the dynamics of interest in topics, compare the popularity of different queries, and find related news. The service helps to understand current trends, track seasonal changes in popularity, and find content that interests your audience.
GoogleTrends.no_data_description: Failed to load trends. Please try again later.
GoogleTrends.no_data_extended: The Google Trends service is temporarily unavailable.
